Title: Relates to amending the general business law, insurance law, and public health law regarding preneed insurance premiums
LawCode: Amd §453, Gen Bus L; amd §§107 & 3208, Ins L; amd §3450, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to preneed insurance; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
